reviews.sentence: Noisy. Clean rooms Friendly staff. Noisy room due to old pipes moved to a different room. New room was acros the street from local bar. Loud trucks garbage and recycle at 7 am.

Even better than expected. The island is small so almost no location is bad but this hotel was in a prime location. Staff was nice and informative. They offer so much great advice on what to do and where to go. The wifi literally never worked for 1 second. Luckily I did not need. it it would have just been nice to have.

Great Anniversary Trip. We went out to Catalina for our one year anniversary and had a great stay. Hotel staff was very friendly even sent up a nice note and box of chocolates to congratulate us. Rooms are small like all hotels in Catalina but it was perfect for what we needed. Only real downside was the show was extremely narrow but it is not really that big a deal.

Well located old hotel. I stay here every summer due to its location to the beach and front walk way. There are no elevators and it is an old hotel but the price and location are the best there is. After a long day you do not want to walk blocks and blocks to your room. The service is friendly and the coffee is on the house. The rooms have AC and good TVs just do not expect too much being an old hotel it has it is quirks. They also offer beach towels at no charge.

Great place to stay. Excellent location. Great complimentary coffee at the cafe next door. Staff was very nice and genuine. No complaints. The only remarks about the hotel are that the bathrooms are small but they disclosed that and I am ok with that. My room was larger than I thought it would be which was a plus. Lobby is very nice and gives you that historic hotel feel which made it inviting every time you walked in. Bathroom door casing looked like it had water damage and could be an easy fix. Loved my stay and will be returning.
Historic Catalina at a Good Value. Location location location. Clean nice staff convenient luggage storage and use of clean bathrooms once checked out. Hotel is old but charming and clean.
Very quiet clean and staff was amazing. It was close to everything. Very central. Lol the stairs. We were on the third floor. But it was not terrible.
We loved this hotel. Lovely bed. the staff were very helpful when I was taken ill. they allowed us to use a room until it was time for us to leave to catch the Catalina Flyer.
Excellent location and value. Location friendly staff good value. Needs small cosmetic repairs.
Amazng ” Will be back soon. The staff went over and beyond my expectations.

Not happy. Prompt blanket and towel service. Bathroom shower door looks old and rusty. beds look cheap. no small refrigerator authorized a hold on my card for half of the stay in advance. Then after checkout authorized a hold of the full amount for the room. Still trying to resolve this issue.

A good get a way place. This is the fourth time we stayed at the Atwater. We like the history attached to the hotel it is in a good location about a 15 min walk from the Catalina Express. There is a Chinese restaurant next door a pizza place and a locals burger burrito place across the street. The island tour plaza is also located across the way and Vons is a street behind the hotel. The staff is friendly and courteous. We usually arrive before check in and leave our bags with the concierge. They send a text when the room is ready. The beds are comfortable If you have a choice ask for the rooms with the larger bathroom. Other than that this place is pretty nicewals are a little thin the room we stayed in had small bathroom shower but not bad for just a quick shower. There are no elevators but the staff was very helpful. The guests in the adjacent room were rude and loud at 6 am they were yelling for their kid in the hallway instead of walking over to grab him.

Historic Hike Super Comfy Bed. There are no elevators in the hotel and the main staircase is a grand one. My boyfriend and I got a workout in just hiking up and down the stairs a few times during the day. But the hotel staff is very friendly and the building is historic but beautiful. Our bed was a king sized one and it was oh so comfy. Which made it a little hard to get out of due to its invitation to stay and sleep a little longer. When visiting Avalon this will be our go to hotel.

Return Guest Disappointed on Birthday Stay. The GM was extra friendly and enthusiastic about making the experience better though the damage had kind of been done already. They seem to be more than willing to do what they can to fix things I had just rather said issues have been prevented. Was switched from a King to a Queen room without my knowledge then had issues with the night staff not fulfilling requests. And the ironing board cut my finger so they just brought us another one instead of switching it out.
Good. The Desk staff was not always available or there to answer the phone and our bags almost did not make it to the ship on time. More organization would be nice.
Room was not ready until after 3 pm. Had to email in the small lobby. Asked the front the desk for help in directing us to the midst do while in the island and she seem lost and confused.

Great family hotel. great location. The staff was awesome. Everyone was friendly. Though our room was not ready by 3 the staff accommodated us by getting us a better room at no extra cost. Great customer service. Shout out to the staff helping with luggage. extremely friendly. Made our trip pleasurable. Thank you.

Pricey room for size fair customer service great location. The hotel is in a prime location with in walking distance of most everything. Liam one of the hotel staff was awesome. Very friendly and attentive. The room rate was a little expensive for the accommodations. The room is a Bit small. No place to store clothes or luggage in room. The staff needs a little more customer service polishing. One of The maid staff was a bit rude when asked to clean the room. We got back to the room at almost 5 pm and the room was not cleaned. We put the do not disturb sign on the door when we were in the room for a few minutes because we saw the maid staff st a room near ours. I went and asked about cleaning the room and she said you had the sign on the door in a bit of a rude tone. I told her we had been out all day and it 5 pm the room has not been touched and the sign was not on the door until we came back. Rooms facing street get a bit of noise from people walking by and golf carts going by.
Great Stay. The location was excellent. The hotel clean and the staff friendly. The room keys were problematic. Also no chair in room to sit at desk.

nice stay in catalina. The hotel was fine many steps 46 to third floor to get to room. Air conditioning was perfect. Water pressure in shower pretty pathetic. Maid service was sometimes slow. Location perfect 10 minutes walk to boat dock rooms quiet and well insulated for sound desk staff friendly and helpful. Stored luggage without complications and at no charge. Only found one ice machine but it worked. Lucky to get rooms facing harbor many rooms have views of roofs air conditioning units. unable to get wi fi to work. rooms are small but adequate missed having a coffee maker. also no fridge or microwave. breakfast coupon for Bens worked well.

For the most part we still had a great time with family and friends and everything is close. The location is excellent for walking to just about everything. Not staffed adequately. Beach towels gone by 1AM. They are closing in a couple of months and will be closed for 2 years so they are probably cutting down on staff. Those that were there tried to accommodate all the guests but it was pretty impossible. Check in at 3 pm turned into 415. Honestly though this is the first time in 5 years that it has been this bad. It definitely is in need of a nice renovation.

Previous stays here good this time not so much. The price was good and the hotel is centrally located right off of front street in Avalon so it is easy to get to everythingthey need different pillows too fluffy woke up with a stiff neck. Also I slipped in the shower and hit my head on the sink and when I reported it to the front desk staff there was basically no response I had to insist upon an accident report be filled out to cover both myself and the hotel in case any additional problems were to occur due to my head injury.
Although the staff was awesome we will never choose this hotel again. The beds were comfortable. The staff was acomodatingThe hotel is so old and worn down.
